title: kaumah.github.io
body: You are already here! This is my portfolio which started off as raw HTML and CSS, was converted to React using create-react-app in 2020, and has recently been migrated to Vite. It is meant not only to showcase my work but also to run experiments

title: Youtube Uploader Clone
body: This is a barebones YouTube Uploading client that I made in order to get familiar with implementing OAuth2 along with Google sign in. It allows a user to create, view, update, and delete basic attributes of a video. UPDATE: I believe this is broken now, but I had some fun writing backend code to hack a solution together for managing video access control.

title: Shuttle Tracker App
body: In Progress - An app that is used to model the location of a shuttle service. Built fully in Typescript using MongoDB, Express, and React. It implements user authentication with password salting and hashing, strict typing of API requests, and rudimentary role based access.
